mapper.select: select id as id, name as name, icon as icon, link as link, status as status, remarks as remarks from wx_menus where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into wx_menus( id, name, icon, link, status, remarks ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{icon}, #{link}, #{status}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: update wx_menus set name = #{name}, icon = #{icon}, link = #{link}, status = #{status}, remarks = #{remarks} where id = #{id}
